name: My Talking Cat Lily 2
description:
My Talking Cat Lily 2 wants an owner to look after her and her needs. Become her owner and make the best decision.

Features of My Talking Cat Lily 2:

Take care of Talking Cat Lily 2, the cutest virtual pet on the planet.

Make sure your virtual pet is clean. Bathe her and wash her paws.

Be a makeup artist. Make your virtual pet Lily beautiful by applying makeup on her face.

Choose the most fashionable outfit for your virtual Talking Cat Lily, and make her stand out.

Go shopping for groceries and make a yummy meal for Talking Cat Lily 2, your own virtual pet.

After a long day, put talking Lilly to sleep and wrap her in blankets.

Meet My Talking Lily's mini pet.

Design virtual cat Lily's house.

Play exciting mini-games and collect coins.

Download My Talking Cat Lily 2 game for free right now. Have your personal virtual pet who will help you fight boredom.

Download link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lily2.tallking.game

Our site: https://www.gravity-code.com/
